languages.text: "Такое дело, Ваша Светлость. По-простому объясню, извините, не приучен говорить с царственными особами..."
"Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."
languages.original_text: "Такое дело, Ваша Светлость. По-простому объясню, извините, не приучен говорить с царственными особами..."

traits.locale_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight, I'm sorry I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."
"Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight, I'm sorry I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."
"Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."
"Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."
"Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

languages.text: “是这么回事儿，大人，我就干脆开门见山地说吧。真抱歉，我不知道怎么和上层人说话……”
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: “是这么回事儿，大人，我就干脆开门见山地说吧。真抱歉，我不知道怎么和上层人说话……”

languages.text: «Verá, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Seré directo. Lo siento, no sé cómo hablar con la gente de posiciones elevadas...».
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: «Verá, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Seré directo. Lo siento, no sé cómo hablar con la gente de posiciones elevadas...».

languages.text: 「端的に言わせてもらうよ、陛下。すまんが、お偉いさんとどうやって話せばいいのかわからんもんで…」
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: 「端的に言わせてもらうよ、陛下。すまんが、お偉いさんとどうやって話せばいいのかわからんもんで…」

languages.text: "Es geht um Folgendes, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich sage es Euch einfach rundheraus ... Es tut mir leid, ich weiß nicht, wie man mit hochgestellten Persönlichkeiten spricht ..."
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht um Folgendes, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich sage es Euch einfach rundheraus ... Es tut mir leid, ich weiß nicht, wie man mit hochgestellten Persönlichkeiten spricht ..."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi d'avance, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins. Je ne sais pas comment m'adresser à quelqu'un de la noblesse... »
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi d'avance, Votre Seigneurie, mais je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins. Je ne sais pas comment m'adresser à quelqu'un de la noblesse... »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Size karşı açık olacağım. Af buyurun ama sizin gibi ulvi kimselerle nasıl konuşulur bilmem."
languages.original_text: "Here's the thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'll just give it to you straight — I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk to lofty folk..."

traits.locale_text: {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Size karşı açık olacağım. Üzgünüm, nüfuzlu kişilerle nasıl konuşacağımı bilmiyorum..."
